sentences.en: As my mum described the scene, I cried uncontrollably, thinking of Helen.
sentences.cn: 母亲在讲述的时候, 我想到海伦,控制不住自己哭了起来.

sentences.en: At this point in his story he would weep uncontrollably.
sentences.cn: 故事讲到这,他会无法控制地哭泣.

sentences.en: He felt very cold, he was shaking uncontrollably, his teeth were chattering.
sentences.cn: 他觉得很冷, 禁不住打寒战, 牙齿格格打颤.
她控制不住地心跳加速。

sentences.en: I found myself shaking uncontrollably with cold.
sentences.cn: 我发现自己冷得不由自主地哆嗦.

sentences.en: I started shaking uncontrollably and began to cry.
sentences.cn: 我不由自主地开始发抖，接着就哭了起来。

sentences.en: In some cases, the malfunction caused cars to uncontrollably.
sentences.cn: 在几个案例中, 该故障导致汽车突然加速.

sentences.en: Not even as I shook and trembled uncontrollably in the trenches, did I forget your face.
sentences.cn: 即使是当我在战壕中控制不住地颤抖，我也不曾忘记你的容颜。

sentences.en: She simmer for a minute or two , then begin shout uncontrollably.
sentences.cn: 她强忍了一两分钟, 然后情不自禁地大叫起来.

sentences.en: She simmered for a minute or two, then began shouting uncontrollably.
sentences.cn: 她强忍了一两分钟, 然后情不自禁地大叫起来.
她不由自主地哭了起来。

sentences.en: Stuttering almost uncontrollably , Billy rejects the idea.
sentences.cn: 毕利结结巴巴地拒绝了这个建议.

sentences.en: The cart careered uncontrollably down the hill.
sentences.cn: 大车失去控制,猛冲下山.

sentences.en: The child was in floods of tears , ie was crying uncontrollably.
The muscles in the athlete's leg went into spasm , ie tightened uncontrollably and painfully.
This means your blood does not clot and you will bleed uncontrollably.
sentences.cn: 这意味着你的血液不会凝固，你会控制不住地出血。

sentences.en: We were all in fits ( of laughter ) ( ie laughing uncontrollably ) at his jokes.
sentences.cn: 他的笑话逗得我们前 仰 后合.

words.tran_cn: 无法控制的；无法管束的；难以驾驭的

trans.tran_cn: 无法管束的, 控制不住的
